item.title: Tips and tricks for hugo
item.description: Opening Links in New page Override default behaviour by adding a render-link.html file under layouts. Follow this page for more details. Handle Katex Create a shortcode for katex with {{ .Inner }}. This would ensure all text meant for Katex is not processed.
